name: Blast Corps Prototype
description:
Blast Corps Prototype is straight up what it´s named after. 

BlastCorps for nintendo 64 is a hidden gem of cool nintendogames, developed by Rare. 

This is a prototype I made that is like a simple remake of the core gameplay of that good old classic. 

Destroy houses to clear path of a moving truck loaded with a nuke that nobody have control over. You control a yellow traktor and the time is slim.
